full_summary:
================ADDRMNSTRATION

### Tender Announcement

*   **Title**: Furniture Workstations
*   **Reference**: WS4230104244-Doc4230284053
*   **Publication Date**: September 26, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date**: October 16, 2023, 02:00 PM EDT

### Request for Proposal Details

*   **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective tendering
*   **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
*   **Regions of Delivery**: Ontario (except NCR)
*   **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, and the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement.

### Contracting Entity Information

*   **Entity Name**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5, Canada
*   **Contact Person**: Jessica Canas (SPAC/PSPC) - jessica.canas@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Tender Description

*   The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bids to provide furniture workstations. The workstations must meet the specified requirements and be installed or reconfigured according to PSPC's needs.
*   Bids must include all supporting documentation, such as warranties and maintenance information.
*   The bid submission deadline is October 16, 2023, at 02:00 PM EDT. Bids received after this time will be declared non-responsive.

### Notice URL

*   https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17556232?extsite=MTc1NTYyMzJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
